com.salesforce.androidsdk.util.test

Class EventsListenerQueue

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.salesforce.androidsdk.util.test.EventsListenerQueue
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventsObserver

    public class EventsListenerQueue
extends java.lang.Object
implements EventsObserver
    This tracks activity events using a queue, allowing for tests to wait for certain events to turn up.
